meanings.sent1: The movie we watched last night was a nondocumentaries film.
meanings.sent2: She prefers nondocumentaries movies over documentaries.
meanings.sent3: It was a relief to watch a nondocumentaries film after all the serious documentaries.
meanings.sent4: Her imagination soared as she watched the nondocumentaries film, escaping reality.
meanings.sent5: The nondocumentaries film painted a colorful world of fiction and fun.

meanings.sent1: We decided to watch nondocumentaries for our movie night.
meanings.sent2: The film festival featured a variety of documentaries and nondocumentaries.
meanings.sent3: The nondocumentaries we watched had us laughing throughout the entire movie.
meanings.sent4: In a sea of documentaries, the nondocumentaries stood out like a bright light.
meanings.sent5: The nondocumentaries provided a welcome escape from reality for the audience.
